text:
Both my kids attended this school since they were in K2.  My elder one has graduated from the Eimaths program and my younger one is still with the school.

The modules are good. The school not only teaches what MOE's syllabus require but also trains the kids' thinking through IQ questions, which form part of the exercise books given. Teacher Macy is caring, patience and has good knowledge on the subject. Both my kids love Teacher Macy.
Teacher Macy is caring and patient. Most of the time, she give extra time to ensure that my child really understands. My kid results improve from 15/20 to 29/30 in less than 6 months.

My son is in Primary 4 when he join eiMaths and he was having difficulties in his problem sum solving, factors, multiples etc. Through eiMaths lessons and teacher Macy’s guidance, he manage to catch up his school work and he score band 1 for his Semester Assessment. He also enjoy the lessons with teacher and the exercise provided by the centre help him to understand the syllabus better.

Hi, I would to express my gratitude to Ms Macy whom is currently tutoring my daughter. Ms Macy has been extremely patience with my daughter. Despite, my daughter's slowness, she encourages her and teaches her beyond just math but good virtues.

Credit goes to teacher Macy who taught my child to be more creative in problems solving. This has boosted my child’s confidence greatly. Her dedication in helping students to develop mathematical understanding is highly commendable. A huge thank you!
